data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Tracy Lynn Wiltrout | Paul G. Fink Funeral Home Inc.
data.text:
Tracy Lynn (Liston) Wiltrout, 57, of South Connellsville, passed away on Tuesday March 12, 2024 at UPMC Presbyterian Hospital, Pittsburgh.

She was born October 20, 1966 in Connellsville, a daughter of the late John and Jennie (Pritts) Liston.

She graduated from Connellsville High School in the Class of 1985. Tracy was employed through Sensus as a machine operator.

Tracy was an avid metal detectorist, traveling to many different lakes and beaches to search for all different kinds of finds and treasures. One of her favorite places to visit was Erie, where she was able to visit the beach and go metal detecting along the lake. She also enjoyed visiting many other beaches and spending time with all of her grandbabies, whom she adored.

Tracy is survived by her husband of 23 years, David G. Wiltrout; her daughter, Angela Newton; granddaughter, Ellaree; grandsons, Keith III (Danielle) and Dylan Kahne; great-grandson, Keith IV; siblings, Mark Liston (Becky) and Diane Homer.; many nieces and nephews; mother-in-law, Priscilla Smiley; sister-in-law, Lisa (Chuck) Helms; brother-in-law, Jim (Lora) Smiley and special friends, Kelly (Dave) Enos.

In addition to her parents, Tracy was preceded in death by her brother, John Liston Jr.

Family and friends will be received in the PAUL G. FINK FUNERAL HOME, INC. 418 North Pittsburgh Street Connellsville, PA 15425 on Thursday from 6pm – 8pm, Friday from 2pm – 4pm and 6pm – 8pm and on Saturday from 10am until the hour of the funeral service at Noon with Pastor Lee Maley officiating.

Interment will follow at Mt. Auburn Cemetery, Dunbar.

Your personal written memories and tributes are welcome and encouraged at www.paulgfinkfuneralhome.com
